name: Space Defender (SnipsDEV)
description:
Space Defender is a third person shooter where you fight off waves of enemies and move through the levels you have to fight until you arrive at the end.

The new update is on gamejolt and gamejolt only because it is too big for itch.io you can download it here https://gamejolt.com/games/-spacedefender/330620

All music by Ender Guney check out his channel! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHEioEoqyFPsOiW8CepDaYg/search?query=courage

Update: Made it faster paced and harder.
